short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to convert INR values in lakh/crores to USD

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converting from the crores and lakhs in which many financial figures are written in India into conventional units in other currencies often becomes a unnecessarily tedious task. This simple and handy widget allows one to convert these with ease into USD, GBP and and other international currencies.
